mapper.select: SELECT id,code,tel_function,call_type,phone_number,answer_status , start_date,end_date,answer_date,create_user,create_date FROM call_records ORDER BY create_date
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO call_records ( id, code, tel_function, call_type, phone_number, answer_status , start_date, end_date,
answer_date,
create_user, create_date )VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{telFunction}, #{callType}, #{phoneNumber}, #{answerStatus} , #{startDate}, #{endDate},
#{answerDate},
#{createUser}, #{createDate} )
